resources.string: This is the Terms and Conditions for the use of this application. 1. You must have a valid bank account and an on-line banking password. 2. Any cheques deposited via this app must be held for 14 days. 3. Any cheques deposited may be held by the bank before they are deposited according to your chequeing agreement. 4. Standard fees apply to any cheque deposited via this app. 5. All penalty fees will be applied for dishonoured cheques deposited via this app.
